Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
draws_barsWidget for displaying draws
hand_classes_barsWidget for displaying hand classes as progressbars
line_editSubclass of QLineEdit for focusIn(int) signal, for player cards, matches tab index in tabs
loqhnessApplication main dialog
tab_board_tWidget which contains and shows board data
tab_overview_tWidget which shows an overview of several tab_player_t widgets
tab_player_tWidget which contains and shows player data
